senior.title: Senior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Exhibit proactive leadership and ownership, driving improvements in processes, solutions, and goal attainment.
Explore technologies to enhance current functionalities and introduce new features.
Have ownership of most features in Creator Studio, specifically focusing on the Overlay editor.
Mentor junior developers, enhancing their coding skills and fostering best practices.
Develop enhanced tools with better performance and optimisation.
Manage the transitioning of new branding that'll change the whole core colour.

mid.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Played a key role in initiating the development of the company's most intricate editor tool, Creator Studio.
Optimised the onboarding system, refining processes and tools to boost the development pipeline for subsequent onboarding phases, ensuring smoother transitions and improved efficiency.
Actively engaged in engineering strategy discussions and code review.
Architected and implemented reusable frontend components, including styleguide library with a keen focus on scalability and extensibility.
Addressed intricate challenges for web3D problem and be the team's expert on web3D solutions.
Developed a drag-and-drop template builders, enabling users to easily arrange elements on their virtual tour and one-page property website.
Ensured frontend reliability with thorough testing, optimising user experience across browsers and devices.
Contributed in core projects like new sign-up flow, payment flow, and rebrand.

junior.title: Junior Developer
responsibilities: Collaborated with senior developers to implement new features.
Actively Participated in the full software development cycle, collaborating with the developer team, designers and product manager to launch features.
Managed and oversaw the 3 company's static websites.

intern.title: Intern Developer
responsibilities: Migrated the company's static website from Squarespace to a proprietary hosting solution.
Built the company's refreshed public-facing static website with a new design and brand identity.

ohm.title: Building Volunteer
responsibilities: Assisted visitors with information as well as recorded and reported visitors statistics.

rmit.title: Assistant Team Leader
responsibilities: Assisted team leader with mentoring a team of Year 11 and Year 12 students on creativity workshops for RMIT University Art & Design experience days.
